text: William Agee (December 25, 1905 - March 26, 1954) was an American long- distance runner. He competed in the marathon at the 1928 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1905 births Category:1954 deaths Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1928 Summer Olympics Category:American male long- distance runners Category:American male marathon runners Category:Olympic track and field athletes of the United States Category:Sportspeople from Richmond, Virginia
title: William Agee (athlete)
